name: Pre-forms n' Plat-drinks
description:
Game was made over the course of a couple of weekends for the June 2021 "One Game A Month #1" Jam.

The game is a simple platformer where the goal is to reach the objective (a bottle of beer) in each level under a time limit, with the twist that your controls will invert frequently due to the characters "drunkenness"

While the game can be a bit difficult due to the controls, every level is possible to complete.

Good luck :)

Credits

Programming & Art by me

Music (The Lounge) from: https://www.bensound.com
